<p><strong>这只是大学生博主记录完成Web大作业的全过程。欢迎各位指点，谢谢!</strong></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">昨日成果</h2>
<p><img src="https://p9-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/edf9afe6e85944a5b917446e9a983272~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="image.png" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">今日任务</h2>
<p>今天开始写吃苹果：把游戏初步完成。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">放置苹果</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">putApple</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">//随机放置苹果</span>
    apple = &#123;
        <span class="hljs-attr">x</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">Math</span>.floor(<span class="hljs-built_in">Math</span>.random() * BLOCK_COUNT),
        <span class="hljs-attr">y</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">Math</span>.floor(<span class="hljs-built_in">Math</span>.random() * BLOCK_COUNT)
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-comment">//判断苹果有没有放在蛇身上</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span>(<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> i=<span class="hljs-number">0</span>;i<snake.body.length;i++)&#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (snack.body[i].x === apple.x &&
            snack.body[i].y === apple.y) &#123;
          putApple()
          <span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>
        &#125;
    &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>很简单的思路，给苹果一个随机位置，然后判断有没有在蛇身上，如果在蛇身上就再生成一个随机的苹果坐标。</p>
<p>然后就是把苹果画出来。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">//draw 苹果</span>
    context.fillStyle = <span class="hljs-string">'red'</span>
    context.fillRect(
        apple.x * BLOCK_SIZE + <span class="hljs-number">3</span>,
        apple.y * BLOCK_SIZE + <span class="hljs-number">3</span>,
        BLOCK_SIZE - <span class="hljs-number">3</span>,
        BLOCK_SIZE - <span class="hljs-number">3</span>
    )

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">分数</h2>
<p>游戏必不能缺少分数，然后就是写分数部分了。</p>
<p>在getStart()函数设置分数为0</p>
<p>然后每次吃苹果都分数+1</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">eatApple</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;
    snake.size +=<span class="hljs-number">1</span>
    putApple()
    updateScore(score + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>然后更新分数的函数是这样写的，获取score+1到newScore，然后把newScore赋给score，然后插入网页。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">updateScore</span>(<span class="hljs-params">newScore</span>) </span>&#123;
    score = newScore
    <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.getElementById(<span class="hljs-string">'score_id'</span>).innerHTML = score
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">难度变化</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">updateGameLevel</span>(<span class="hljs-params">newLevel</span>) </span>&#123;
    level = newLevel
    
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (gameInterval) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-built_in">clearInterval</span>(gameInterval)
    &#125;
    gameInterval = <span class="hljs-built_in">setInterval</span>(gameRoutine, <span class="hljs-number">1000</span> / (level+<span class="hljs-number">7</span>))
  &#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>为了更好的模仿诺基亚上的贪吃蛇小游戏，这里引入了难度变化机制。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-5">背景音乐</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html copyable" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">audio</span> <span class="hljs-attr">controls</span>  <span class="hljs-attr">autoplay</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"autoplay"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">loop</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"loop"</span>></span>
       <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">source</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"./music/music.wav"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"audio/wav"</span>></span>
<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">audio</span>></span>

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>（1）其中如果声明了controls，浏览器将提供一个包含声音，播放进度，播放暂停的控制面板，让用户可以控制音频的播放。</p>
<p>（2）loop：布尔属性；如果声明该属性，将循环播放音频。</p>
<p>（3）autoplay：布尔值属性；声明该属性，音频会尽快自动播放，不会等待整个音频文件下载完成。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-6">快捷键</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"> <span class="hljs-comment">// u 85 i 73</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(event.keyCode === <span class="hljs-number">85</span>)&#123;
        mode1()
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(event.keyCode === <span class="hljs-number">73</span>)&#123;
        mode2()
    &#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>为了给玩家更好的游戏体验，我设计了开始两种游戏模式的快捷键。分别是U键开始双方向模式，I键开始四方向模式。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-7">使用base64编码来展示图片</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><div>
        <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">img</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"data:image/jpg;base64,"</span>/></span></span>
</div>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre></div>
